Html:
Hello,

I want to deploy an application that only needs to be copied to the applications directory but UAC is keeping me from doing that - could you please give me some help on how to configure the update so the files are copied to a subfolder of %programfiles% ? The folder creation as part of the update does work...

Thank you very much!

Regards
Gismo

I think the better way is to do this with Group Policy Preferences or with a Batch Script as a computerstartupscript.

xcopy \Server\Share %programfiles%\Folder
